actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8 damage) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
